pizzaProgram.utils
Class PriceCalculators

java.lang.Object
  pizzaProgram.utils.PriceCalculators

public class PriceCalculators
extends Object

Class for generating properly formatted strings of the various prices in the system.

Author:
IT1901 Group 3, Fall 2011

PriceCalculators

public PriceCalculators()
Method Detail

getPriceForDish

public static String getPriceForDish(Dish d)
Generates a priceString on the form "0,00" based on the price of the dish, without VAT added (i.e. a price in norwegian øre of 12345 would return a string which contains "123,45".

Parameters:
d - the dish to get the priceString for.
Returns:
The priceString as specified above.

getPriceForDishPickupAtRestaurant

public static String getPriceForDishPickupAtRestaurant(Dish dish)
Returns a formatted String for the cost of pickup at the restaurant

Parameters:
dish - The dish to calculate and format the price for
Returns:
A formatted String of the price for a dish for picking up at the restaurant

getPriceForDishDeliveryAtHome

public static String getPriceForDishDeliveryAtHome(Dish dish)
Returns the formatted price for delivery at home

Parameters:
dish - The dish to calculate and format the price for
Returns:
A formatted Stirng representing the price for delivery at home

getPriceForOrderWithVATAndDelivery

public static String getPriceForOrderWithVATAndDelivery(Order o)
Generates a priceString on the form "0,00" based on the sum of the items in the order, with VAT and delivery cost added (IE a price in norwegian øre of 12345 would return a string which contains "123,45".

Parameters:
o - the order to get the priceString for.
Returns:
The priceString as specified above.

getPriceForOrderWithoutVAT

public static String getPriceForOrderWithoutVAT(Order o)
Generates a priceString on the form "0,00" based on the sum of the items in the order, without VAT and delivery cost added (IE a price in norwegian øre of 12345 would return a string which contains "123,45".

Parameters:
o - the order to get the priceString for.
Returns:
The priceString as specified above.

getPriceForOrderWithVAT

public static String getPriceForOrderWithVAT(Order o)
Generates a priceString on the form "0,00" based on the sum of the items in the order, with VAT, but without delivery cost added (IE a price in norwegian øre of 12345 would return a string which contains "123,45".

Parameters:
o - the order to get the priceString for.
Returns:
The priceString as specified above.

o - the order to get the delivery cost for.

The priceString as specified above.

getVATForOrder

public static String getVATForOrder(Order o)
Generates a priceString on the form "0,00" containing the VAT for the provided order (IE a price in norwegian øre of 12345 would return a string which contains "123,45".

Parameters:
o - the order to get the VAT for.
Returns:
The priceString as specified above.

priceInputVerifier

public static int priceInputVerifier(String priceText)
Verifies input for prices, all prices need to be on the form assured here, it will return the øreprice if the input is correct, else it will return -1

Parameters:
priceText - the pricestring to be formatted
Returns:
the correct øreprice or -1 if the string is wrong

getPriceForOrder

private static int getPriceForOrder(Order o)
Generates the value of the order, in norwegian øre (1/100 NOK), based on the sum of the ordered dishes and extras in the order. Does not include VAT or delivery cost.

Parameters:
o - the order to get the value for.
Returns:
The value of the order in norwegian øre as an int.

getValueForOrderDish

private static int getValueForOrderDish(OrderDish od)
Generates the value of the ordered dish, in norwegian øre (1/100 NOK), based on the sum of the ordered dish and its extras. Does not include VAT.

Parameters:
od - the ordered dish to get the value for.
Returns:
The value of the ordered dish in norwegian øre as an int.

getPriceForOrderDish

public static String getPriceForOrderDish(OrderDish od)
Generates a priceString on the form "0,00" containing the VAT for the provided ordered dish (IE a price in norwegian øre of 12345 would return a string which contains "123,45".

Parameters:
od - the ordered dish to get the priceString for.
Returns:
The priceString as specified above.

getPriceForExtraOnDish

private static int getPriceForExtraOnDish(Dish d,
                                          Extra e)
Parameters:
d - the dish the info in the string is to be in relation to.
e - the extra the info in the string is to be in relation to.
Returns:
returns an integer øre-price of an extra on a spesific order Extra to the given Dish. used to calculate the price with different taxes

getPriceForExtraOnDishPickup

public static String getPriceForExtraOnDishPickup(Dish d,
                                                  Extra e)
Generates a string displaying the change in price if you add the given Extra to the given Dish with the VAT for picking up the order at the restaurant added.

Parameters:
d - the dish the info in the string is to be in relation to.
e - the extra the info in the string is to be in relation to.
Returns:
a string in the form of "+0,00" or "-0,00" depending on wether or not it is a positive or negative price change.

getPriceForExtraOnDishDeliver

public static String getPriceForExtraOnDishDeliver(Dish d,
                                                   Extra e)
Generates a string displaying the change in price if you add the given Extra to the given Dish with the VAT for deliveries added.

Parameters:
d - the dish the info in the string is to be in relation to.
e - the extra the info in the string is to be in relation to.
Returns:
a string in the form of "+0,00" or "-0,00" depending on wether or not it is a positive or negative price change.

getPriceForExtra

public static String getPriceForExtra(Extra e)
Generates a string on the form "+0,00", "-0,00" or "*0,00" containing the price modification adding the given extra will have on a dish.

Parameters:
e - the extra to get the price modification from.
Returns:
the priceString as specified above.

Method that sets the static fields of the class based on a fetch from the Config table of the database.
